scripts.migration:generate:docker: docker compose -f docker/local/docker-compose.local.yml exec backend pnpm --filter backend migration:generate
scripts.migration:create:docker: sh -c "docker compose -f docker/local/docker-compose.local.yml exec backend pnpm --filter backend migration:create src/migrations/$MIGRATION_NAME"
scripts.migration:run:docker: docker compose -f docker/local/docker-compose.local.yml exec backend pnpm --filter backend migration:run
scripts.migration:revert:docker: docker compose -f docker/local/docker-compose.local.yml exec backend pnpm --filter backend migration:revert
scripts.migration:show:docker: docker compose -f docker/local/docker-compose.local.yml exec backend pnpm --filter backend migration:show
scripts.seed:docker: docker compose -f docker/local/docker-compose.local.yml exec backend pnpm --filter backend seed
